headline: Leidos to modernize Kazakhstan's air traffic control system for future growth with nationwide common automation platform
summary: Building on more than 20 years of supporting the Republic of Kazakhstan's aviation operations, Leidos (NYSE: LDOS) recently signed a contract with Kazaeronavigatsia (KAN), the country's air navigation service provider, to modernize the air traffic control system to accommodate the significant growth that's projected for the country's aviation sector.

thumbnail.caption: Leidos is a Fortune 500 (r) innovation company. (PRNewsFoto/Leidos)

headline: Leidos (LDOS): How Analyst Optimism and Upgraded Earnings Outlook Are Shaping Its Valuation
summary: Leidos Holdings (LDOS) has captured fresh investor attention after analysts highlighted its positive earnings outlook. A recent Zacks Rank upgrade and favorable earnings ESP have signaled increasing interest as the company’s next results approach. See our latest analysis for Leidos Holdings. Momentum is clearly with Leidos Holdings right now, as its share price has climbed more than 10% in the past month and is up an impressive 37% year-to-date.
